com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.BufferField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.BufferField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferMap.ReservedField
    Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.BufferField
extends BufferMap.AbstractField
    This class is for fields that contain a large amount of data that does not need to be parsed By default, the toString() output only prints the number of bytes in the buffer. However, a flag can be specified in the constructor to have it print the contents of the buffer in a formatted hex table

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField

        bitOffset, isReservedField, offset, sizeInBits, sizeInBytes, units

      Standard constructor

      • enableBufferPrinting

        public void enableBufferPrinting(boolean print)
        sets up whether or not to print the contents of the buffer when calling toString()
        Parameters:
        print - true to print the data in the buffer, false to only print the size of the buffer
